user_query: I'm planning a surprise trip for my family to Senegal. Can you provide me with the nearest metro station, facilities such as hospitals and colleges in Dakar, and the reverse geocode for the latitude 14.693425 and longitude -17.447938? Also, fetch me the country information and conversion details for the United States.

TaskList.description: Fetch the nearest metro station in Dakar, Senegal.
Retrieve information about hospitals and colleges in Dakar, Senegal.
Perform reverse geocoding for the coordinates (14.693425, -17.447938).
Fetch currency conversion details for the United States.
